statements: SELECT * FROM customer_recommendations
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_recommendations WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, purchase_history FROM customer_recommendations WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_recommendations ORDER BY last_interaction DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_recommendations WHERE last_interaction > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM customer_recommendations WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_recommendations WHERE last_interaction > now() - interval '1 week'
SELECT JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(purchase_history) AS total_purchases FROM customer_recommendations WHERE customer_id = 2
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_recommendations ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(HOUR FROM last_interaction)) AS avg_interaction_hour FROM customer_recommendations
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT name, gender FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customers.name, purchases.product_name, purchases.price FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_age;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY customer_age DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 AND customer_gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, recommended_product_id FROM customers JOIN product_recommendations ON customers.customer_id = product_recommendations.customer_id ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, date_generated FROM customers JOIN recommendations ON customers.customer_id = recommendations.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address, transaction_date, amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, r.recommendation_date FROM customers c JOIN recommendations r ON c.customer_id = r.customer_id JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.customer_id = 3 AND r.recommendation_date >= '2022-01-01';
